content:
The .NET
Admin SDK
can be installed using the .NET package manager: Install-Package FirebaseAdmin -Version 3.1.0 Alternatively, install it using the dotnet command-line utility: dotnet add package FirebaseAdmin --version 3.1.0 Or, you can install it by adding the following package reference entry to
your .csproj file: <
ItemGroup
>
<
PackageReference
Include
=
"FirebaseAdmin"
Version
=
"3.1.0"
/
>
<
/
ItemGroup
>
